info.name: Same Window
info.summary: Prevent links on frontend widgets from opening in new windows/tabs
info.description:
The Same Window app ensures that all links on frontend widgets open in the same window/tab instead of opening new windows or tabs in the browser. This provides a more seamless user experience by keeping users within the current Nextcloud interface.
Features: - Automatically modifies links to open in the same window - Supports dynamic content through mutation observers - Compatible with the latest Nextcloud versions
info.author: Developer
